entry.def: A schematic diagram or picture shows something in a simple way.

example.ex: This is represented in the schematic diagram below.
example.tran: 这正如下面的这幅简略图所示。

example.ex: ...a schematic picture of the solar system.

means.word_mean: 1. diagram of an electrical or mechanical system
1. represented in simplified or symbolic form

auth_sentence.content: These images show a schematic and real-world images of such a device.
auth_sentence.res_content: These images show a schematic and real-world images of such a device.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These images show a schematic and real-world images of such a device.

auth_sentence.content: The violence here is spasmodic, the passions more schematic than unchained.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The violence here is spasmodic, the passions more schematic than unchained.

auth_sentence.content: In his weaker work, this trope can seem glib and schematic.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In his weaker work, this trope can seem glib and schematic.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或科学"; 2. 表形容词,通常放在名词后,表示"与……相关的,……的"; 3. 表名词,"某种药或医学有关"

stems_affixes.word_buile: lunate月+ic人或科学→lunatic月亮的圆缺引起精神病等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 浪漫的,传奇式的;不切实际的,好幻想的
stems_affixes.word_buile: roman浪漫+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.浪漫的,传奇式的;不切实际的,好幻想的
a无,缺乏+pathe=path感情+tic与……相关的,……的→无动于衷的
aroma芳香+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.芳香的
chao混乱+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.混乱的
charisma超凡魅力,感召力+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.有魅力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 戏剧的,戏剧性的;剧烈的
stems_affixes.word_buile: drama戏剧+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.戏剧的,戏剧性的;剧烈的
enigma谜+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.神秘的,难解的
gene因子,基因+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.遗传[学]的 n.[-s]遗传学
schema=scheme图解,摘要+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.扼要的,图解的
psych心理[的]+o+tic人或科学→adj.&n.精神病的,疯子
lunate月+ic人或科学→lunatic月亮的圆缺引起精神病等
gene因子,基因+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.遗传[学]的 n.[-s]遗传学
anti反+bio生命+tic某种药或医学有关→反生命→反细菌→抗生素

means.word_mean: 纲要的,图表的;示意的, 概略的
